### Axis Labels

```{r}
library(plotly)
set.seed(123)

df <- diamonds[sample(1:nrow(diamonds), size = 1000),]

fig <-  ggplot(df, aes(carat, price)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  theme(axis.ticks = element_line(size = 10))
```
